name: GUNNKOUR
description:
My first ever game made with Godot!

This game is basically the result of an idea I had and wanted to see if it was possible to create. I had a blast using Godot for my first time and am DEFINITELY  going to use it again! :D

I was yearning to quickly release this and start on a new project, but If I had more time to work on it I would of: 

Added a leaderboard system

Implemented proper settings saving

More weapons

More levels

Controls:

WASD for Movement

Space to Jump

Shift to Run

Control to Walk Slowly

Left-Click to Shoot

Right-Click to Reload

1, 2, 3 to Switch Weapons
